19 Aug 2010

Are Disney and Crayola out of  brown ink?

By in category

My daughter chose this colouring book that uses a kind of ‘revealing’ ink for a recent treat.

In this case, the ink revealed a slightly more caucasian Jasmine than we recall from the movie.

What gives?

Posted via email from Barry A. Martin Feed

About us

Hypenotic is a marketing strategy, design & development firm that chooses to use its powers for good. We’re a certified founding member of B Corp in Canada. Since ’98, we’ve helped a lot of interesting people do important things. We create relevant communications and useful experiences. Find out more.
